item.title: So lucky to be in #Antwerp #Belgium as the #foodtruck #foodfestival was on - with 6 lines of booths (70+?). Right on the #waterfront next to a castle and the #GrotMarkt . Huge mix of #food #vehicles including converted #campers and towed #trailers . #bikes aplenty. #foodie #foodieabroad #Mexican soft #corn #tacos #Indian #tandoori and #naan #Vietnamese #springrolls #Belgian #frites

item.title: Cooking Class with Chef David Adjey, Dish Cooking Studio, Toronto
item.description:
Cooking Class with Chef David Adjey, Dish Cooking Studio, Toronto

We were given the opportunity to get hands-on and prepare 3 different meals. Â Chef Adjey made his way around to provide instruction and tips.

item.title: Joe Squared Pizza, Baltimore, MD
item.description:
Joe Squared Pizza, Baltimore, MD

Joe had a Hawaiian-style pizza and, it being Baltimore, mine was clam, bacon, bocconcini. Oh, yummy!

item.title: Rogue Dead Guy Ale
item.description:
Rogue Dead Guy Ale

A delish Rogue Dead Guy Ale from Oregon to be had at Toronto's Bier Markt

item.title: Starbucks at Korenmarkt in Ghent, Belgium
item.description:
Starbucks at Korenmarkt in Ghent, Belgium

Sometimes, when you're away from home, and you need a really good coffee, you find a sign that welcomes you with its familiarity.
